Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
The main method in the simulation. It sets up the environment for the simulation, then uses other methods to manage the simulation.

Parameters:
args -

openFile

public static boolean openFile()
Gets requests.txt and the console ready to use.

Returns:
Success - true means the scanners were opened successfully, false means there was an error.

handleRequests

public static int handleRequests(int timeClicks,
                                 int maxClicks,
                                 Floor[] building,
                                 Elevator[] elevators)
The main logic of the request handling. The method reads the next instruction from the file, and based on that adds passengers or progresses time.

Parameters:
timeClicks - The number of time clicks that have passed so far. In most cases, this is 0 at the beginning.
maxClicks - The number of clicks to run until.
building - An array that contains every floor.
elevators - An array that contains every elevator.
Returns:
The number of time clicks that progressed during this method.

finishRequests

public static void finishRequests(int timeClicks,
                                  int maxClicks,
                                  Floor[] building,
                                  Elevator[] elevators)
The method that finishes the time clicks that the user specified, if there are more than in the file.

Parameters:
timeClicks - The number of clicks that have already passed.
maxClicks - The number of clicks to stop at.
building - An array of all the floors.
elevators - An array of all the elevators.

addPassenger

public static void addPassenger(Floor[] building)
Read a passenger's data from the file, and add the passenger to the building.

Parameters:
building - An array of all the floors.
